article_title: Donald Trump Tells NBC He Would Behave Differently as President

twitter.description: Donald J. Trump said his shoot-from-the-lip style is not an act. But he conceded in an interview to air on Tuesday that he would act differently as president. When Lester Holt of NBC’s “Nightly News” pressed him in a taped interview about whether he would, say, use a vulgar expletive from a lectern with the […]
